trans-unit.source: All documentation on installing HyperKitty can be found in the documentation provided by the
trans-unit.target: 所有关于安装HyperKitty的文档都可以在以下文件中找到

trans-unit.source: Copyright (C) 2014-2017 by the Free Software Foundation, Inc.
trans-unit.target: Copyright (C)2014-2017 by the Free Software Foundation,Inc.

trans-unit.source: The source code is available on GitLab https://gitlab.com/mailman/mailman-hyperkitty. It is developed by the same people who develop HyperKitty, so you can use the same communication channels to reach them.
trans-unit.target: 源代码可在GitLab https://gitlab.com/mailman/mailman-hyperkitty上获得。它是由开发HyperKitty的同一人开发的，因此您可以使用相同的沟通渠道来联系他们。

trans-unit.source: This module contains a Mailman archiver plugin which sends emails to HyperKitty, the web archiver.
trans-unit.target: 该模块包含一个Mailman存档程序插件，该插件将电子邮件发送到 Web存档程序HyperKitty。

trans-unit.source: This module is licensed under the GPL v3.0
trans-unit.target: 此模块已根据GPL v3.0许可

trans-unit.source: python package. It is also available online at the following URL: http://hyperkitty.readthedocs.org.
trans-unit.target: python包。也可以通过以下URL在线获得：http : //hyperkitty.readthedocs.org。
